Name: Rooie Nelis
Review Text: This is a lovely, hidden gem of a bar with a story behind it that I'll not ruin by putting it on here. When you enter, it's obvious that it's a special place with glamorous photos of the owners, quirky decor and traditional Dutch songs on a loop. Well worth a visit.

Name: Rooie Nelis
Review Text: Tiny old traditional Jordaan bar where music and beer reign supreme. Decked out in glorious Dutch kitsch with every surface of the bar is covered in photographs of glorious moments from its past. The focal point is a letter by the queen thanking the owners for their hospitality...

Name: Rooie Nelis
